mapper.select: select mbr.member_id, mbr.name, mbr.grade_id, grd.grade_name_kr as grade_name from member mbr inner join grade grd on grd.grade_id = mbr.grade_id where mbr.member_id = #{memberId};
select mbr.member_id, mbr.name, mbr.grade_id, grd.grade_name_kr as grade_name from member mbr inner join grade grd on grd.grade_id = mbr.grade_id where mbr.member_id < #{memberId};
